results.title: First Flight From Kabul Is Hailed as Positive Step Amid Troubling Signs

results.title: Africa’s C.D.C. director urges wealthy nations to forego Covid vaccine boosters and donate them instead.

results.title: Elizabeth Warren asks Amazon to ‘stop peddling misinformation about Covid vaccines and treatments.’
results.abstract: In a letter addressed to Amazon’s chief executive, the Massachusetts senator asserted that the company’s search algorithm promotes books riddled with falsehoods about the pandemic.

results.title: As Taliban Crush Dissent, New Leaders Face Cascading Challenges
results.abstract: The Taliban continued to brutally crack down on demonstrations against their rule. The new government faces an unfolding humanitarian crisis and flaring tensions on the Afghan-Pakistan border.
results.byline: By Matthieu Aikins, Salman Masood and Marc Santora

results.title: Armed Thieves Steal Jewels From Bulgari Store in Paris
results.abstract: A suspect is in custody after seven robbers made off with jewelry with an estimated value of millions from the luxury jewelry store in central Paris.

results.title: Abortion Is No Longer a Crime in Mexico. But Most Women Still Can’t Get One.
results.abstract: The Supreme Court’s decision set a legal precedent for the nation. But applying it to all of Mexico’s states will be a long path, and women are still facing prosecution.
results.byline: By Natalie Kitroeff and Oscar Lopez

multimedia.caption: People gather to support the decision of Mexico’s Supreme Court to declare the criminalization of abortion as unconstitutional on Tuesday in Saltillo, Mexico.
multimedia.copyright: Daniel Becerril/Reuters
